upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10, 2.20.
* Updated SDK from 7.19.3 to 7.23.1.
* Updated parameter names and short descriptions in the Configuration Command Class to match the Advanced Setting Article.
* Fixed a bug where manual operation (using the button on the ZEN17) in garage door mode now functions as described in the Advanced Settings Article.
* Fixed reporting behavior after a power outage that previously affected parameter 1 and value 1 for relays and any created child devices. Relays and inputs will now correctly report their status following a power outage.

* Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10, 2.20.
* Updated SDK from 7.19.3 to 7.23.1.
* Updated parameter names and short descriptions in the Configuration Command Class to match the Advanced Setting Article.
* Fixed a bug where manual operation (using the button on the ZEN17) in garage door mode now functions as described in the Advanced Settings Article.
* Fixed reporting behavior after a power outage that previously affected parameter 1 and value 1 for relays and any created child devices. Relays and inputs will now correctly report their status following a power outage
* Added Long Range support for Europe.

* Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10
* Fixed a bug: When parameters 2 and 3 are set to value 11 (garage door mode for the relay/momentary contact and door sensor type for the input), the garage door mode for relays was not working when triggered from Z-Wave UI.
* Fixed a bug: When parameters 2 and 3 are set to value 3 (garage door momentary mode), the garage door mode for relays was not working when triggered from Z-Wave UI.
* Fixed a bug: When parameter 3 was set to value 10 (on/off report / dry contact switch/sensor), the child device was not created as expected.
